text: The Oklahoma City Barons are an American professional ice hockey team that began playing in 2010. They currently play in the American Hockey League and are the farm team of the Edmonton Oilers of the NHL. They play their home games in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma at the Cox Convention Center. Their ECHL affiliate team is the Stockton Thunder. ==Other websites== *Oklahoma City Barons Official Site Category:American Hockey League teams Category:Ice hockey teams in the United States Category:Sports in Oklahoma City Category:2010 establishments in the United States Category:21st-century establishments in Oklahoma
title: Oklahoma City Barons
